name: blockbuilders-tech-speckit
description: Mono-repo skeleton for Next.js frontend and FastAPI backend.

scripts.dev:backend: uv run --directory apps/backend fastapi dev app/main.py --reload
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:frontend && pnpm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: uv run --directory apps/backend ruff check app tests
scripts.test: pnpm run test:frontend && pnpm run test:backend
